metadata.title: CVE-2022-1312 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in storage in Google Chrome prior to 100.0.4896.88 allowedan attacker who convinced a user to install a malicious extension topotentially perform a sandbox escape via a crafted Chrome Extension.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
